com.piggybox.bags

Class BagBinNumeric

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.piggybox.bags.BagBinNumeric

  • public class BagBinNumeric
extends java.lang.Object
    Given a bag of tuples whose first field is numeric (i.e. int, long, float, double), this UDF generates a series of bins (inner bags) whose numeric ranges are not greater than a given range. Note: this operation is order preserving.

    Example: 

     DEFINE BagBinNumeric com.piggybox.bags.BagBinNumeric();
 
 -- input: 
 -- ({(1, a),(2, b),(3, c),(4, d)})
 input = LOAD 'input' AS (B: bag {T: tuple(v1:INT, v2:CHARARRAY)});
 
 -- output: 
 -- ({{(1,a),(2,b)}, {(3, c),(4, d)}})
 output = FOREACH input GENERATE BagBinNumeric(B, 2);

    Author:
    chenxm
    See Also:
    The BagSplit UDF in datafu performs similar actions on categorical values.
